title: Order History tab is available if user has previously placed an order
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has previously placed an order
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the home screen
custom_expected: THEN the ‘Order History’ tab will be available

title: Order History tab is not available if user has never previously placed an order
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has never previously placed an order
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the home screen
custom_expected: THEN the ‘Order History’ tab will not be available

title: User is navigated to Order History when tapping Order History tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has previously placed an order
AND the user is on the home screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps Order History
custom_expected: THEN the user will be navigated to the Order History screen

title: ‘Order History’ is labeled as the header for the Order History tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has previously placed an order
AND the user taps Order History from the home screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user is navigated to the order history screen
custom_expected: THEN the screen header will be labeled ‘Order History'

title: Summary list of present orders are available in the Order History section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has placed an order
AND the order is OPEN
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps Order History from the home screen
AND is navigated to the Order History
custom_expected: THEN the a summary list of all presently open order will be available

title: Summary list of past orders are available in the Order History section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the has previously placed and order 
AND the order is already closed/ picked up
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps Order History from the home screen
AND is navigated to the Order History
custom_expected: THEN the a summary list of all past orders will be available

title: Orders are sorted by Month, then Date Then Time (Most recent first)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has previously placed a few orders order (open and/ or picked up)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps Order History from the home screen
AND is navigated to the order history
custom_expected: THEN the orders are all sorted by Month, then Date Then Time (Most recent first)

title: Establishment Name displays on order history summary for every order
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has previously placed a few orders order (open and/ or picked up)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps Order History from the home screen
AND is navigated to the order history
custom_expected: THEN the Establishment Name will display on the order summary for each order

title: Location displays on order history summary for every order
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has previously placed a few orders order (open and/ or picked up)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps Order History from the home screen
AND is navigated to the order history
custom_expected: THEN the Location will display on the order summary for each order

title: Date Ordered displays on order history summary for every order
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has previously placed a few orders order (open and/ or picked up)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps Order History from the home screen
AND is navigated to the order history
custom_expected: THEN the Date Ordered will display on the order summary for each order

title: Time Ordered displays on order history summary for every order
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has previously placed a few orders order (open and/ or picked up)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps Order History from the home screen
AND is navigated to the order history
custom_expected: THEN the Date Ordered will display on the order summary for each order

title: Picked up order 'Add to Cart' button is available for a picked up order on order summary screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Order History screen
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps a picked up order
AND the user is navigated to the order summary screen
custom_expected: THEN the ‘Add to Cart’ button will be available for this order

title: ‘Add to Cart’ button is pinned to bottom of the screen for ‘Picked up’ orders
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Order History screen
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps a picked up order
AND the user is navigated to the order summary screen
custom_expected:
THEN the ‘Add to Cart’ button will be available for this order
AND the ‘Add to Cart’  button will be pinned down to the bottom of the screen

title: User can add multiple Picked Up order items to cart
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the Order History screen
AND the user taps a picked up order
AND adds the order to cart
custom_steps: WHEN the user returns to the Picked up Order on the Order History screen
custom_expected: THEN the order will be added to cart along with the previous order added

title: User can Add more items after adding picked up order to cart
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the Order History screen
AND the user taps a picked up order
AND adds the order to cart
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps ‘Add more items’ from the cart
custom_expected: THEN the user will be navigated to the menu which allows the user to add more items to this already created order
